availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, resident. Married to Raughley Sullivan in 1834. Mother of James W. Sullivan, John K. Sullivan, Robert N. Sullivan, and Elizabeth Sullivan. Resident in Muhlenberg County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Yates Publishing, U.S. and International Marriage Records, 1560-1900, Ancestry, source no. 4994.000. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, Subdivision 2, p. 247. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, District 1, p. 668.
